public Result loginByGitHub(@Valid @Length(min=20,max=20,message="Authorization code length must be 20.") @Pattern(regexp="^[a-z0-9]+$",message="Only english characters or digit are valid in authorization code.") @RequestParam

                                                                      @Valid String registrationCode,
                                                                      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
